valid: For the period 18:00 (UTC) on Sun 28 Sep 2025 to 18:00 (UTC) on Mon 29 Sep 2025
general_synopsis: Low Spain 1011 slow-moving with little change by midday tomorrow. High 300 miles northeast of Azores 1031, slow-moving declining 1028 by same time

Wind
In west, variable 2 to 4. In east, southeasterly 6 or 7, decreasing 3 to 5.
Sea state
In west, moderate or rough, becoming slight. in east, rough becoming moderate, occasionally slight later.

In west, rain at first. In east, rain then showers.
Visibility
In west, poor becoming good. In east, moderate or poor becoming good.
